Essential Nutrition Actions: improving maternal, newborn, infant and young child health and nutrition
quantities of calcium in their diet (193, 194, 195, 196, 197). Recent studies have supported this 
hypothesis, although there have been some inconsistencies in the strength and public health 
applications of the associations (198, 199). In addition, the possible biological actions of prenatal 
calcium supplementation are not completely understood.
